attachments.displayName:
NEXT WEEK:
Wed Nov 6 7:30pm
The Seadog Slam presents:
If you are in the Dallas area, love scifi and fantasy and good spirited Pirates, come on out. They've given me a time slot to plug the new book, Two Suns Rising and answer, "What is Steam Punk?"

THE MAGNIFICENT AND STUPENDOUS
STEAM POWERED OMNIBUS
OF ART SCIENCE AND KNOWLEDGE
the steampunk gazette:
garb and garters gear and gadgets
prose and poetry music and muse
energy and exploration and ecstasy
HALF PRICE BOOKS Flagship Store
5803 E Northwest Hwy Dallas TX 75231
214 379 8000

object.content:
NEXT WEEK:
Wed Nov 6 7:30pm
The Seadog Slam presents:
If you are in the Dallas area, love scifi and fantasy and good spirited Pirates, come on out. They've given me a time slot to plug the new book, Two Suns Rising and answer, "What is Steam Punk?"

THE MAGNIFICENT AND STUPENDOUS
